Eve of the Reunion Tour (Trick or Treating)!

1
Maylan
Thursday, October 26th, 2017, 11:59:28 AM

When: Tuesday, October 31 at 9:30pm EST Where: The tour will begin at the White Haven Courtyard (Room 3410)

Come join Maylan and her merry band of land pirates as they tour the towns of Icemule Trace, Wehnimer's Landing, and Solhaven to visit the CHE tents on the Eve of the Reunion! Come away with lots of treats and hopefully a few scares! Costumes encouraged but not required -- this is a fun (and likely drunken) tour!

Event details here: http://housewhitehaven.weebly.com/house-events.html
